## Setting

### set()

```{r}
rows <- list(3:4, 5:6)
cols <- 1:2
for (i in seq_along(rows)) {
  
  set(DT,
      i = rows[[i]],
      j = cols[[i]],
      value = NA)
  
}
```

### setnames()

```{r}
setnames(DT, "V2", "Rating")
setnames(DT,
         c("V1", "V3"),
         c("Yes", "No"))
```

```{r}
setcolorder(DT, "V3")
```
